reviewText: Based on my grandpa's observations this is a wonderful success! He is 5 1/2 years old and gets so I evolved in the programs that he does not even hear us talking to him. He prefers watching this to eating his breakfast or lunch. What else can I say but to rate this excellent.
My 10 year old grandson is a serious Sonic fan and he loves this! He wants us to get him other Sonic DVDs as gifts.
Sent as a gift.  Everyone Loved it. Especially the Birthday Girl.  I have ordered many hats, lunch box, stuffed sizes etc
My 4yr old son loved the hat so much. But I have a little more shopping to do for the lil guy and Amazon is the best place to do my shopping at. Thank you Amazon

My 10 and 6 year old grandsons love Sonic,especially the younger one. Some Sonic cartoons are a little scary,
my daughter says, this one isn't. It's not violent either. It's more for the younger kids, this one.

My son LOVES it! He was really happy when we got it (jumping up and down) and he has watched it constantly four times in a row (it was pushing the play button over and over.
The show is great, my son was laughing, he didn't understand some of the jokes and the voice for Sonic sounds like a young kid. But other then the voice problem it was a great DVD.
A great movie for my nephew he really liked this Sonic Movie. I would recommend this movie for Sonic Fans.

My son has developed a deep interest with all of the 80's classics...including Sonic..Super Mario Bros, and Pacman...so of course Amazon has exactly what I needed...so I could steal my cell phone back from continuous YouTube Usage lol....and to get it on Amazon Prime was priceless!
My son was super happy to see this since they took this series off Netflix and he loves it!
My son loves this DVD !
My 6 year old grandson loved seeing these episodes.  He hadn't seen them before.
great present for kids
My son loved it

My 5 year old loves Sonic and enjoys this DVD, however, I'm the one that is giving this a one star from a parental point of view. This DVD uses words like; stupid, imbecile, dumb, jerk, etc.... There is also some scary parts for a 5 year old... Knives, yelling, hitting, fighting, etc... I really do not think it's appropriate for a 5 year old.
My son loves it!
Grandson loves it.  Good service

My husband and daughter love watching this!

Got this for my nephew, he loved it!
Nothing like the old movies/cartoons. My kids loved it but got bored pretty fast to. However, even though they got bored of it fast they want to take it every where and see it.
LOVE THIS

My girls are age 9 and10, they love all things Sonic.  They say Sonic shows are funny.  This disc has the following episodes:  Black Bot The Pirate, Pseudo Sonic, Too Tall Tails, Sonic The Matchmaker, Slowwww Going, Road Hog, and Attack On Pinball Fortress.
This classic video if very entertaining.
good
I purchased this disc along with the Sonic Mega DVD. It also has about 155 minutes of Sonic and is equivalent to Sonic Mega in both enjoyment and value.
